issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
As a datapoint,  I am running on one of the SL machines.

Starting `vrc_task_1.launch`, without moving the robot, simply
~~~
rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan
rostopic hz /multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw
~~~
produces 40Hz scan and 30Hz camera images as expected.  But if also subscribing to hand camera at the same time:
~~~
rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
~~~
All three topics drop to 25Hz.

Further, by subscribing to the left Sandia hand camera
~~~
rostopic hz /sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/left/image_raw
~~~
All GPU sensor rates drop to 15Hz.
content.html:
As a datapoint, I am running on one of the SL machines.

Starting vrc_task_1.launch, without moving the robot, simply

rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan
rostopic hz /multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw

produces 40Hz scan and 30Hz camera images as expected. But if also subscribing to hand camera at the same time:

rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw

All three topics drop to 25Hz.

Further, by subscribing to the left Sandia hand camera

rostopic hz /sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/left/image_raw

All GPU sensor rates drop to 15Hz.
